title: Chapter 527
body:
Chapter 527

527 The power Upanishad crystal vein

“Let’s go!”

...

Lu Ming patted dandan and she flew towards the Saint Jade.

Seeing Lu Ming flying over, shengyu was terrified. He kept screaming and crawling forward.

“Shengyu, who’s dead now?”

Lu Ming sprawled on dandan’s body and flew above the Saint Jade, looking down at it coldly.

“Lu Ming, you’ve killed so many people from the Sheng family. You’ll die too.”

Shengyu roared.

hehe, I don’t know how many times you people from the Sheng family have said the same thing. I’m tired of hearing it.

Lu Ming smiled faintly, his eyes filled with killing intent.

“Wait, wait! Lu Ming, I’m begging you. I’m begging you not to kill me. I can swear, I can swear a blood oath that I won’t say a word about what happened today. I’m begging you to spare me this once.”

Seeing Lu Ming’s murderous intent, shengyu was afraid and actually began to beg for mercy.

“I still believe in the dead.”

Lu Ming was unmoved.

no, don’t, Lu Ming. I know that there’s an esoteric crystal vein in the demonic scales dimension. If you let me go, I’ll tell you the location of the vein.

Shengyu shouted.

“A power Upanishad crystal mine?”

Lu Ming’s heart trembled and his eyes shone.

A power Upanishad crystal mine was different from a power Upanishad crystal pit.

A pit of intent crystals could only produce a few pieces, or at most a few dozen.

However, a profound meaning crystal vein was completely different. Even the smallest profound meaning crystal vein could produce more than a hundred pieces of profound meaning crystal.

And this was the smallest one. If there were more, there would be no more.

This was a huge temptation for anyone.

“Tell me, where is the power Upanishad crystal mine?”

Lu Ming asked in a deep voice.

“As long as you promise me that you won’t kill me, I’ll tell you. Otherwise, I won’t tell you even if I die.”

Shengyu shouted.

“You …”

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered and he seemed to be hesitating.

Shengyu was on tenterhooks, afraid that Lu Ming would kill him.

After hesitating for a while, Lu Ming said, ” “Okay, I promise you. I won’t kill you. Tell me, where is the power Upanishad crystal vein?”

swear! Swear a blood oath! I’ll only believe you if you do that!

Shengyu called out.

you talk too much nonsense. Since you don’t believe me, then go to hell!

Lu Ming’s killing intent was intense.

“Wait, I’ll tell you, I’ll tell you. In my storage ring, there’s a blue jade card that records the exact location of the crystal mine.”

Shengyu shouted, then looked at Lu Ming expectantly.”I’ve already told you. You just need to take out the Jade token and you’ll know.”

“Oh?”

Lu Ming nodded and patted dandan. “Smash it!”

Buzzzzzz!

It shook and smashed towards the head of the Saint Jade.

ah, Lu Ming, you said that you won’t kill me …

Shengyu roared, but before he could finish, he was hit by dandan, and his head burst like a watermelon.

I said I won’t kill you, but that doesn’t mean other things can’t kill you.

Lu Ming muttered.

“Dandan, can you take off those storage rings?”

Lu Ming patted dandan again.

Dandan’s body trembled and a ray of light emanated from it. It swept up the Saint Jade’s storage ring and it flew into Lu Ming’s hand.

Lu Ming was overjoyed. He continued to follow the law and took all the storage rings of the other Sheng family youths.

Unfortunately, their blood essence was all gone after being struck by the lightning cauldron, so they couldn’t devour it.

Then, Lu Ming found the demon subduing spear in a pile of rocks.

“Dandan, let’s quickly leave this place.”

Lu Ming said.

Just now, there had been a great commotion here, and it might have attracted other creatures.

Now that Lu Ming was so weak, he would be dead for sure if any scaled demon, Di Tian divine guards, or corpse guards came.

Immediately, dandan carried Lu Ming and flew into the distance.

After flying for tens of thousands of miles, Lu Ming found a rather remote place and entered the Supreme shrine.

There were many bottles and jars in the Supreme shrine, all of which were high-grade pills that he had obtained from other martialists.

Lu Ming picked up the grade one healing pill and took a big gulp from the bottle. There were a total of nine pills. He swallowed all of them and began to heal.

Lu Ming’s physical body had already reached complete rank-6 and was slowly recovering.

As the medicinal effects spread throughout his body, his body’s recovery rate was greatly accelerated.

Lu Ming’s muscles were wriggling slowly. On the wound on his chest, the muscles wriggled and new muscles grew slowly, covering the wound and finally blocking his heart.

Otherwise, one could see his beating heart from the outside, which was extremely terrifying.

After the healing pills had been consumed, Lu Ming took out another bottle and swallowed it.

An hour later, Lu Ming heaved a long sigh of relief. His injuries had finally stabilized.

“This time, it was really dangerous!”

Lu Ming sighed.

To be honest, this time, it was beyond his expectations.

He had wanted to kill the Saint Jade after he had obtained more Supreme spiritual crystals and reached Lv 4 martial King realm.

He didn’t expect to be ambushed by the Saint Jade.

Moreover, the key point was that the Saint Jade actually had a net-like spirit weapon on her body, which perfectly countered dandan and made her lose her effect.

Otherwise, with dandan around, Lu Ming could also break out of the siege.

That was why Lu Ming was in an unprecedented danger and was almost cut in half by Saint Jade.

If it wasn’t for the lightning cauldron, he would have really died.

Lu Ming guessed that the Thunder cauldron had taken him as a temporary shelter. It did not want him to die, so it helped Lu Ming at the critical moment.

“In the future, I should be more careful. I can’t be careless, and I can’t underestimate others.”

Lu Ming thought to himself.

Soon after, he began circulating the true war Dragon technique to recover.

Now, Lu Ming’s body was empty, without a trace of essential core.

The Qi cyclone in his dantian had completely stopped circulating and was motionless. Lu Ming continuously circulated the true war Dragon technique, but the Qi cyclone remained motionless.

However, Lu Ming did not stop. He kept circulating the true war Dragon technique. An hour later, under Lu Ming’s persistent efforts, the cyclone finally moved and started to spin slowly.

Slowly, a wisp of quintessential essence was born from the vortex. It flowed through Lu Ming’s meridians and circulated throughout his body.

“Alright!”

With a wisp of true essence, things would be much easier.

Lu Ming took out a pile of top-grade spirit crystals and started to absorb the spiritual energy in them to speed up his recovery.

Just like that, Lu Ming recovered his essential core while healing his injuries.

In the blink of an eye, three days had passed.

Three days later, Lu Ming’s condition had recovered to its peak.

The injuries on his body had also healed.

Of course, the 50 years of life that he had lost could not be recovered.

Lu Ming sat cross-legged, playing with a blue jade card in his hand, deep in thought.

This Jade tablet was the one that recorded the location of the esoteric crystal vein that Saint Jade had mentioned.

Lu Ming had taken a look earlier. There was indeed a map inside. The location of the esoteric crystal vein was marked.

However, Lu Ming did not rush there immediately.

“Is shengyu really that kind to tell me the location of the esoteric crystal vein? Even if it’s for the sake of my life, I have no choice but to be careful of any traps.”

Lu Ming pondered.
